mapper.select: SELECT id,cid,taskId,taskTitle,content,sendId,money,state,createDate,updateDate from xsl_task where id>=1 and sourceType='weChat' and state=0 ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT name from xsl_task_category where id = #{cid}
SELECT name from xsl_master LEFT JOIN xsl_user on xsl_master.userId = xsl_user.userId where xsl_master.masterId=#{sendId}
SELECT url from xsl_master LEFT JOIN xsl_file on xsl_master.userId = xsl_file.fileId where xsl_master.masterId=#{sendId}
select id from xsl_task_category where name = #{name}
SELECT userId from xsl_user WHERE masterId=#{userId}
select masterId from xsl_user where userId=#{userId}
select hunterId from xsl_user where userId=#{userId}
select taskId,createDate,taskState from xsl_hunter_task where hunterId = #{hunterId} and taskState !=0
mapper.update: UPDATE xsl_task_category SET taskNum = taskNum+1 WHERE name=#{name};
update xsl_task set state =#{taskState} where taskId=#{taskId}
